wikitext.*:
'''''L'Arc et le Heaume'' n°5''' (''Au-delà de la Terre du Milieu'') is the fifth issue of the fanzine ''[https://www.tolkiendil.com/asso/mag L'Arc et le Heaume]'' by the [[Tolkiendil (Tolkien society)|Tolkiendil]] French association. It was published in April [[2017]] and it is dedicated to the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] outside the [[legendarium]].

{{L'Arc et le Heaumenav| 4| 6}}

* Éditorial
** Au-delà de la Terre du Milieu – Vivien Stocker

** ''La Chute d'Arthur'' — revue de Yannick Chazareng

** ''Le Retour de Beorhtnoth, fils de Beorhthelm'' — Damien Bador

** ''Middle English Losenger'' — Vivien Stocker
